title: Hackers Hiding DcRAT Malware in Fake OnlyFans Content
description:
By Habiba Rashid

DcRAT malware includes a ransomware plugin that encrypts non-system files, rendering them inaccessible without the decryption key, which threat actors will likely hold for ransom.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Hackers Hiding DcRAT Malware in Fake OnlyFans Content

title: Seizure of EncroChat Enables Police Access to 115 Million Conversations
description:
By Waqas

As part of Operation Emma, which was initiated in July 2020, the shutdown of EncroChat aimed to curb cybercrime in Europe and beyond.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Seizure of EncroChat Enables Police Access to 115 Million Conversations
